import React from "react"; import { Row, Col, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Dashboard from '../components/dashboard'; import Ribbon from '../components/ribbon'; export default function ToDO() { return ( {/* TO DO Column */}

TO DO

{/* All new tasks are created as "TO DO" by default */} Task 1 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Task 2 Phasellus cursus lorem at nisi vulputate, et consequat justo pulvinar. {/* In Progress Column */}

In Progress

Task A Curabitur ac pretium justo, at pellentesque enim. {/* Review Column */}

Review

Task X Duis blandit lorem vitae odio congue, nec pellentesque urna lacinia. {/* Done Tasks Column */}

Done Tasks

Task Z Integer non enim vitae neque semper accumsan. ); }
